title: Ether is rallying ahead of major upgrade that will let holders more easily access their tokens
description: Ether is trading at a nine-month high as investors expect a major network upgrade to add stability and credibility to the cryptocurrency.

title: Carl Icahn says Illumina’s appeal of FTC order to divest Grail is ‘an almost impossible battle’
description: Carl Icahn shares common ground with the FTC, which argued that Illumina's acquisition of cancer test developer Grail would stifle competition and innovation.

title: Inflation's inventory gluts are here to stay and will hit the bottom line in weaker economy: CNBC Supply Chain Survey
description: The inventory gluts caused by inflationary conditions aren't going to be worked off quickly, according to an exclusive CNBC Supply Chain Survey.

title: McCarthy meets with Taiwan leader as China threatens 'actions' in response
description: The Republican House Speaker McCarthy is the highest ranking American official to meet with a leader of Taiwan on U.S. soil since 1979.

title: Western Alliance shares cut losses after the bank says deposit outflows are stabilizing
description: Shares of Western Alliance Bancorp cut steep losses after the regional bank gave a new update showing deposit outflows stabilizing amid the banking crisis.

title: Google reveals its newest A.I. supercomputer, claims it beats Nvidia
description: Google's TPU-based supercomputer, called TPU v4, is "is 1.2x–1.7x faster and uses 1.3x–1.9x less power than the Nvidia A100," Google researchers wrote.

title: Mark Zuckerberg is spending most of his time on A.I., says Meta CTO
description: Meta's CEO Mark Zuckerberg and CTO Andrew Bosworth are spending the "most" of their time working on the company's new AI unit, Bosworth said in an interview

title: Dominion urges judge to compel Murdochs to testify live in Fox trial
description: Dominion Voting Systems is urging a Delaware judge to compel Fox execs Rupert Murdoch and Lachlan Murdoch to testify live in court.

title: Here's where the A.I. jobs are
description: Nearly 800,000 job listings in 2022 were AI-related roles. From California to New York, the burgeoning industry has found a foothold in every state in the U.S.

title: Blockbuster pushed HBO to start investing in original content, cable giant's ex-chief says
description: Blockbuster's emergence in the late 1980s fueled HBO to bet on original content, according to former HBO and Time Warner CEO Jeff Bewkes.

title: Women are paid less than two thirds of men's earnings at several UK banks, new analysis finds
description: The U.K. finance sector made minimal headway in closing the gender pay gap last year, with some banks stalling — or even undoing — progress.

title: Microsoft, Amazon face cloud competition probe as UK regulator raises alarm
description: Microsoft and Amazon were accused by U.K. regulators Wednesday of unfairly restricting competition in the cloud services market.

title: An emboldened NATO provides a bittersweet moment for war-torn Ukraine
description: As Finland's flag was hoisted at NATO's headquarters in Brussels, officially marking its entry to the military alliance, it was a bittersweet moment for Kyiv.

title: Switzerland faced a full-scale bank run if Credit Suisse went bankrupt, Swiss regulator argues
description: FINMA and the Swiss central bank brokered UBS' takeover for embattled Zurich rival Credit Suisse for 3 billion Swiss francs ($3.3 billion), in a deal announced on March 19.

title: The EV industry is gaining momentum. But public charging is a long way from being accessible to all
description: CNBC's Sustainable Future takes a look at discussions surrounding the accessibility of electric vehicle charging points.

title: UBS holds first shareholder meeting since controversial Credit Suisse takeover
description: UBS will hold its annual general meeting on Wednesday morning against a fraught political backdrop following its takeover of fallen rival Credit Suisse, announced last month.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Mounting recession concerns
description: New Zealand surprised markets with a bigger-than-expected rate hike of 50 basis points. The Kiwi strengthened nearly 1% against the dollar after the move.

title: Europe's relationship with China reaches critical juncture after Xi-Putin meeting
description: The 27-member bloc walks a tightrope, looking to develop economic ties with China but also reaffirming a close political and cultural relationship with the United States.

title: Think it's too late to switch jobs? Tell that to 'Asia's best female chef'
description: Lolla's Johanne Siy shares with CNBC Make It about how a "quarter-life crisis" changed the course of her career.

title: Egypt's pound is among the worst performing currencies in 2023. And it's expected to plummet further
description: The economic woes plaguing the Middle East's most populous country means its pound still has a way to plummet, according to the experts.

title: Most countries want tourists back — but Amsterdam is telling these visitors to 'stay away'
description: Amsterdam's local authority launched an online campaign in Great Britain this month that aims to keep out "nuisance-causing visitors."
